summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 43, Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley in the block bounded by Eastlake Avenue, Fuhrman Avenue, Franklin Avenue, Martin Street and Harvard Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14504 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
